goal: Найти контактные данные: email, телефоны, адреса и социальные сети

fields.name: emails
fields.selector: a[href^="mailto:"], [href*="mailto:"], [class*="email" i], [id*="email" i], [class*="contact" i] a[href*="@"], [class*="mail" i], body :contains("@")

fields.name: phones
fields.selector: a[href^="tel:"], [href*="tel:"], [class*="phone" i], [id*="phone" i], [class*="tel" i], [class*="contact" i] :contains("+"), [class*="contact" i] :contains("(")

fields.name: addresses
fields.selector: [class*="address" i], [id*="address" i], [class*="location" i], [class*="office" i], [class*="contact" i] address, [itemprop="address"], .contact-info address, footer address

fields.name: social_media
fields.selector: a[href*="facebook.com"], a[href*="twitter.com"], a[href*="linkedin.com"], a[href*="instagram.com"], a[href*="youtube.com"], a[href*="t.me"], [class*="social" i] a, [class*="icon" i] a[href*=".com"], footer a[href*=".com"]
